mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ai_client_tool_mcp (mcp_id, mcp_name, transport_type, transport_config, request_timeout, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{mcpId}, #{mcpName}, #{transportType}, #{transportConfig}, #{requestTimeout}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT id, mcp_id, mcp_name, transport_type, transport_config, request_timeout, status, create_time, update_time FROM ai_client_tool_mcp ORDER BY id
